chapters.title: Chapter 6: The Westwood
chapters.info: Kari al'Thor, p. 68—Rand's mother. She died about fifteen years ago, when Rand was five. His only memory of her was that she had gentle hands and a soft voice. Tam met her when he left Emond's Field; they were married, and returned later with a child. See also al'Thor, Rand; al'Thor, Tamlin.
